Recap: Rex and Gigi are finally reunited when he discovers she's alive and well and that it was Stacy who died in the basement instead of her. Meanwhile, in Llanview, it looks like Jack is in trouble. John sends him to jail. Téa is ready to represent him but warns Blair it does not look good for her son. Todd then concludes that somebody must have set Jack up. Neela is alone and feeling guilty for tape recording Jack although Vimal and Rama encourage her not to blame herself and realize that Jack needs to pay for what he did. However, that might not be as easily done as they assume since Gigi is alive and well.

[Recorder clicks]

Jack: Mom, it's okay.
Blair: No, it's not okay! Because of you, a woman is dead, Jack!

Shane: It was okay. I still wish you could have been here. Grandma echo couldn't make it back from her shoot in Mendorra, but it was still fun spending it with Viki.
